{{tt|std::collate_byname}} is a {{lc|std::collate}} facet which encapsulates locale-specific collation (comparison) and hashing of strings. Just like {{lc|std::collate}}, it can be imbued in {{lc|std::regex}} and applied, by means of {{l2tt std|cpp/locale/locale/operator()}}, directly to all standard algorithms that expect a string comparison predicate.

{{dsc end}}
